import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({selector:'app-about',templateUrl:'./about.component.html',styleUrls:['./about.component.css']}) export class AboutComponent {}

About Me

I'm Bazmi Uddin, a Full Stack Developer from Gwalior with over 3 years of experience in building and optimizing scalable web applications using Angular, PHP (CodeIgniter & AdonisJS), and MySQL.

Currently, I work at Ubitech Solutions Pvt. Ltd., where I lead the development of HRMS and CRM platforms — streamlining workflows, automating attendance and payroll systems, and enhancing user experience through dynamic interfaces.

I’m passionate about creating high-quality, performance-driven software solutions that combine clean architecture, efficient logic, and beautiful UI/UX. I thrive in collaborative environments, love solving complex problems, and continuously explore new technologies to keep improving.

🚀 Scalable Web Apps
⚙️ Workflow Automation
🧠 Problem Solving
👥 Team Leadership
  • Angular
  • TypeScript
  • JavaScript
  • PHP (CodeIgniter / AdonisJS)
  • MySQL
  • Bootstrap
  • Git
  • Vercel
